patterns: where can I find the website?
responses: You can visit our official website at http://www.mpnmjec.ac.in
The official website of MPNMJEC is: http://www.mpnmjec.ac.in

M.P.Nachimuthu M.Jaganathan Engineering College was established in 2001. The foundation for this educational excellence was laid in 1984 with the establishment of the M.P.Nachimuthu M.Jaganathan Polytechnic College (Diploma).
The engineering institution was opened in 2001, but the journey started in 1984 when the Polytechnic (Diploma) college was founded.
The founder of MPNMJEC is Udyog Rattan Thiru. J. Sudhanandhen.
Thiru. J. Sudhanandhen is the visionary founder of our college.
The correspondent of our college is Dr. Vasantha Sudhanandhen.
Dr. Vasantha Sudhanandhen serves as the Correspondent for MPNMJEC.
The principal of our college is Dr. M. Ramesh.
Dr. M. Ramesh is the Principal of MPNMJEC.
See you later, thanks for visiting MPNMJEC!
Have a nice day!
Bye! Come back again soon.
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure
You're welcome!

I can guide you through admissions, UG/PG courses, facilities (Library, Hostel, Transport), and placements at MPNMJEC.
I provide information about our departments, founder, correspondent, principal, and campus location.
I am here to answer your queries regarding the MPNMJEC college experience.

M.P.Nachimuthu M.Jaganathan Engineering College offers the following UG courses: 
1. Civil Engineering
2. Computer Science and Engineering
3. Electronics and Communication Engineering
4. Electrical and Electronics Engineering
5. Information Technology
6. Mechanical Engineering
Our UG departments include Civil, CSE, ECE, EEE, IT, and Mechanical Engineering.
The Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE) department at MPNMJEC has a total intake of 60 seats. The HOD is Dr. R. Mohan, ASP/ECE.
In the ECE department, the total number of seats is 60 and the HOD name is r.mohan asp/ece.
The Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) department at MPNMJEC has an intake of 60 seats. The HOD is Mr. K.N. Sivakumar.
In the CSE department, we have 60 seats and the HOD is Mr. K.N. Sivakumar.
The Civil Engineering department at MPNMJEC has an intake capacity of 60 seats. The HOD is Dr. R. Kavidha.
Our Civil department offers 60 seats and is headed by Dr. R. Kavidha.
The Electrical and Electronics Engineering (EEE) department at MPNMJEC has 60 seats available. The HOD is Dr. D. Sabapathi.
The EEE department intake is 60 students and the HOD is Dr. D. Sabapathi.
The Information Technology (IT) department at MPNMJEC has an intake of 60 seats. The HOD is Dr. T. Sureshkumar.
Our IT department provides 60 seats and is led by Dr. T. Sureshkumar.
The Mechanical Engineering department at MPNMJEC has an intake of 60 seats. The HOD is Dr. K.P. Vetrivel.
Mechanical department intake is 60 seats and the HOD name is Dr. K.P. Vetrivel.
The Master of Computer Applications (MCA) department at MPNMJEC has an intake of 60 seats. The HOD is Mr. D. Viswanathan (Associate Professor).
Our MCA department offers 60 seats and is headed by Mr. D. Viswanathan.
The Master of Business Administration (MBA) department at MPNMJEC has an intake of 60 seats. The HOD is Dr. V. Ravikumar (Associate Professor).
Our MBA program has a total of 60 seats and is led by Dr. V. Ravikumar.

MPNMJEC offers various PG courses including: 
- M.E. CAD/CAM
- M.E. Computer Science and Engineering
- M.E. Power System Engineering
- M.E. Structural Engineering
- M.E. VLSI Design
- Master of Business Administration (MBA)
- Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
Our PG programs include multiple M.E. specializations, MBA, and MCA.

patterns: Does the college have a library?
responses: Our campus provides excellent facilities including: Gym, Library, Sports, Transport, Internet, and Hostel.
MPNMJEC offers a well-equipped Library, Gym, Sports grounds, 24/7 Internet, and Transport facilities for students.

patterns: What are the clubs in college?
responses:
MPNMJEC has various active clubs including:
1. IoT Club (Department of ECE)
2. AI Club (Departments of IT and CSE)
We have an IoT club running in the ECE department and an AI club running in both the IT and CSE departments.

The college is located at Sudhanandhen Kalvi Nagar, Chennimalai, Erode - 638112, Tamil Nadu.

You can find us on Google Maps here: https://maps.google.com/?q=M.P.Nachimuthu+M.Jaganathan+Engineering+College

M.P.Nachimuthu M.Jaganathan Engineering College is situated in Sudhanandhen Kalvi Nagar, Chennimalai, Erode, Tamil Nadu 638112. Click for directions: https://maps.google.com/?q=MPNMJ+Engineering+College+Chennimalai

Yes, we provide separate hostel facilities for boys and girls. The food provided is purely vegetarian (Veg), and we ensure comfort by providing individual cots in every room. All types of accommodations are possible here.
MPNMJEC offers secure hostel accommodation with vegetarian (Veg) food service. Rooms are equipped with individual cots for each student, ensuring a comfortable stay.
Yes, the college operates buses for students and staff from various parts of the Erode district.
Transport facility is available at MPNMJEC with multiple bus routes covering surrounding areas.
You can contact MPNMJEC at 04294 - 250242 or 04294 - 251616. For admissions, you can call 98652 33600 or 73736 44088.
Our contact numbers are 04294-250242 and 04294-251616. Admission queries: 9865233600, 7373644088.
The official email of MPNMJEC is mpnmjec@mpnmjec.ac.in. For admissions, you can email admissionmpnmj@gmail.com.
You can reach us via email at mpnmjec@mpnmjec.ac.in or admissionmpnmj@gmail.com for admission-related queries.
Our campus spans 22.71 acres and features 38 ICT-enabled classrooms, state-of-the-art laboratories, and a modern auditorium with a seating capacity of 276.
The MPNMJEC campus is spread across 22.7 acres with excellent infrastructure including specialized labs and smart classrooms.
Our library is one of the largest in Erode district, providing access to textbooks, e-journals, NPTEL videos, and DELNET resources.
The college library is well-stocked with a vast collection of books, magazines, and digital resources like e-books and project reports.
We have extensive sports facilities including a large playground for football, cricket, and basketball, along with two gyms and a dedicated yoga center.
MPNMJEC encourages sports with fields for various outdoor games and facilities for indoor games like table tennis, chess, and carom.

patterns: can I learn driving in college?
responses: Yes, driving school facilities are available within the college campus for students' convenience.
Yes, we have a driving school available in our college premises to help students learn driving.

patterns: What type of food is provided?
responses: In M.P.Nachimuthu M.Jaganathan Engineering College (MPNMJEC), we provide purely vegetarian (Veg) food to all students in the mess and canteen.
M.P.Nachimuthu M.Jaganathan Engineering College follows a strictly vegetarian food policy in its mess and canteen facilities.
Only vegetarian food is provided at MPNMJEC to ensure a healthy and traditional dining experience for all students.
